summary: This document is a summary of a WebEx interview conducted by an FBI Special Agent with Dan Besselsen, Assistant VP of Finance at Interlochen Center for the Arts. The interview focuses on Besselsen's role, his familiarity with financial records and donor contribution processes, and the provision of marked documents to him. The document references specific exhibits (GX 741b/c, GX 744) and notes the Court's pseudonym order.

connections.description: Dan Besselsen reports to CFO Pat Kesley in his role as Assistant VP of Finance at Interlochen.
The FBI Special Agent (SA) interviewed Dan Besselsen via WebEx regarding financial records and processes at Interlochen.

events.title: WebEx Interview with Dan Besselsen
events.description: An FBI Special Agent conducted a WebEx interview with Dan Besselsen, Assistant VP of Finance at Interlochen, discussing financial records, donor contributions, and providing him with marked documents.

locations: Interlochen Center for the Arts campus
keyFacts: Dan Besselsen, Assistant VP of Finance at Interlochen since 2012, was interviewed by an FBI Special Agent regarding financial records and donor contributions.
Besselsen's role involves overseeing finance, purchasing, payroll, and working with the Board; he is familiar with records like GX 741b/c related to external audits of donor contributions.
The interview referenced specific exhibits GX 741b/c and GX 744, the latter being a report from Salesforce used for tracking contributions and other business functions.
Besselsen was informed about the Court's pseudonym order (3528-001) during the interview.
The document is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs (7, 8, 9, 10, 15, and 17).
